summary: This is an automatic out-of-office email reply from an individual involved in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20-cr-330), indicating they will be on leave the week of December 28, 2020, and providing an alternative contact method for urgent matters.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as the defendant in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20-cr-330).

keyFacts: The document is an out-of-office auto-reply email dated December 28, 2020.
It references the ongoing federal criminal case 'United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell' (docket number 20-cr-330).
The sender is a participant in the case (likely legal or administrative staff) who will be on leave but checking email.
An alternative contact (name redacted as EFTA00015879) is provided for urgent matters.
The document shows administrative activity related to the Maxwell prosecution around the end of 2020.
